author: pamarcelot
msg: Fixed a bug that could caused a malformed expression in the case where a BaseSubtreeSpecification has both chopBefore AND chopAfter values (a ',' was missing between the chopBefore and the chopAfter values in the printToBuffer() method).

author: jonesde
msg: Updated dtds/xsds to latest versions for site update

author: jonesde
msg: Fixed fk-name that was too long

author: imario
msg: do not disconnect all persistence contexts but only those used by the current request

author: cschoett
msg: Fix for beehive-1076, added code to support class-level interceptors for Beehive controls.
A class-level interceptor gets applied to all methods in the control interface.
Runtime interceptor behavior remains the same.
Also added new control DRTs for class-level interceptor implementation.
